name: Just LEGGO
description:
Just LEGGO is a game I am making for my unity pathway.

It is not for sale and never will be. I uploaded it here because when I upload it to Unity Play it removes some of the elements of the game. It is a work in progress.

Minimum requirements to run

  • A Desktop PC that is either windows or mac.
  • A beast level graphics card with beast level ram.

I am still learning so I have not applied LOD to this game. Everything is in high detail. I suggest running this game only if you are confident in your rig. That is until I learn more and control the graphics better.

I have had a few friends play this now and they think it is pretty cool. So I thought I would open it up publicly to play for free. If someone can get 5 minutes of enjoyment out of this then I am happy :)

What's the objective in "Just LEGGO"?

The objective is to just let go and play with LEGO. This game is unfinished and might not get finished as it is purely a learning project that I cant do anything with commercially. You can play it for free though. There are currently 9 levels. Each level has a different objective. Each level has a world score. This took a little time to get my head around and is the thing I am most proud of with the project. The game will keep track of your personal best per level and put you on the world board if you beat the time.

Can you beat any of the times that are currently set?

This is best played with a gamepad for gameplay along with a mouse and keyboard for the UI.

"Just LEGGO" and enjoy :)

There is a feedback form along with other Cool Stuff at www.CoolStuffProductions.com
